code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{setSearchTerm}from'../redux/userSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchBar=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const handleInputChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;dispatch(setSearchTerm({[name]:value}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Search by name",onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"username",placeholder:"Search by username",onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"email",placeholder:"Search by email",onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"phone",placeholder:"Search by phone",onChange:handleInputChange})]});};export default SearchBar;
